snippet.title: Zidane Football Generation - Nintendo Game Boy Color
snippet.description:
Zidane Football Generation is a portable soccer simulation for the Game Boy Color. Starring France’s superstar player Zinedine Zidane, it’s all-out action and tactics, as you attempt to prove to all that your team is second to none.

Zinedine Zidane is regarded by many as one the most talented players in the world. For starters, he was a part of the French Team that won the World Cup in 1998 and the 2000 European Championship. He's worth a few bob too: about £30 million paid by Spanish giants Real Madrid to make him their player in time for the 2001/2002 season.
